      Checks whether the specified key is currently pressed

      • mapKey

        public void mapKey(int vKey,
          int rKey)
        Maps a real Key, from the Keyboard to a virtual key, from the Chip-8 System
        Parameters:
        vKey - the virtual key (0-15)
        rKey - a 'real' key, e.g. Keyboard.KEY_A

      • checkKeys

        public void checkKeys()
        - Will be placed into the CPU Instruction Cycle - Checks whether a key is currently pressed and writes it into the internal keys array
